TopicTitle: Has anyone played Star Trek Armada 3

Articles.Content:
Just wondering if anyone has as there is a new patch for it today. STA3 : Call to Arms v1.3

If you have never heard of it, it is a mod for a space RTS called Sins of a Solar Empire : Rebellion. I haven't played the vanilla version, I only bought the game to play this mod after seeing some cool play throughs. The developers have done an amazing job of adding loads of detailed ship textures as well as creating lots of new ships for the Klingons, Romulans, Cardassians and Borg to balance out the ship varieties the Federation have.

If you are fan of Star Trek games, (and I there haven't been any for a while), then I would recommend you check it out, especially if you like massive fleet battles!
